Please fix it asap. since Joint Data Set feature can not work when this bug exist.

JointDataSetHandle does not support 'parameters' property. So getPropertyHandle(DataSetHandle.PARAMETERS_PROP) should return null. (This may cause NPE problem in Designer's codes.)

Model has fixed NPE problem in model's package. We need Designer's help to fix the whole bug. Thanks.
